info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 13 at 10:58AM MST until August 13 at 2:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 200 PM MST. * At 1058 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain near Hualapai Mountain Park. Between 0.75 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Kingman, Hualapai Mountain Park, Wild Cow Campground and Hualapai Peak. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
